title: Unexpected Panic: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body: ### Code ```Rust < Compiling blake2s_simd v1.0.0 thread 'opt 4qthq7w0o7azc13k' panicked at 'Error writing pre-lto-bitcode file `/Users/vivianeford/snarkOS/target/release/incremental/snarkos-2kej2qutho4pt/s-gcxv2nrnji-utq71t-working/4qthq7w0o7azc13k.pre-lto.bc`: No such file or directory (os error 2)', /rustc/4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f/compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/back/write.rs:833:21 stack backtrace: 0: 0x105518bc4 - ::fmt::h85521558a183f368 1: 0x10557388b - core::fmt::write::h01631fae0d2b98bc 2: 0x10550b388 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h675dde99a2999169 3: 0x10551be8d - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h5e5df492d229fd65 4: 0x10551bbe4 - std::panicking::default_hook::h18647b59f1a84ee2 5: 0x10ee0ca2a - rustc_driver[ac70ecf5978e4b80]::DEFAULT_HOOK::{closure#0}::{closure#0} 6: 0x10551c4fb - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hd9ead35a68ccc55e 7: 0x10551c373 - std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}::h6fca91c5e1dc2f30 8: 0x105519047 - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace::h4ff3025d9a0a0490 9: 0x10551c04a - _rust_begin_unwind 10: 0x10559d2e3 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h3d9f795ee387ef8d 11: 0x10ef77b6f - rustc_codegen_ssa[aa21125670a59c52]::back::write::execute_work_item:: 12: 0x10ef4f141 - std[3e3ff1c8909a2cf5]::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::<::spawn_named_thread::{closure#0}, ()>::{closure#0}, ()> 13: 0x10f05d6f7 - <::spawn_unchecked_<::spawn_named_thread::{closure#0}, ()>::{closure#0}, ()>::{closure#1} as core[8ab3e1fc28fda4b6]::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 14: 0x1055257a7 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::hf7c5ae502e9a7ed8 15: 0x7ff803d654f4 - __pthread_start error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic> ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` ``` ### Error output ``` ``` Compiling snarkvm-algorithms v0.7.5 (https://github.com/AleoHQ/snarkVM.git?rev=e866f2d#e866f2d2) thread 'main' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: reqwest::Error { kind: Request, url: Url { scheme: "https", cannot_be_a_base: false, username: "", password: None, host: Some(Domain("vm.aleo.org")), port: None, path: "/testnet3/block/testnet3/9914.block", query: None, fragment: None }, source: hyper::Error(Connect, Error { code: -9806, message: "connection closed via error" }) }', /Users/vivianeford/snarkOS/snarkos/ledger/mod.rs:255:48 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace Compiling snarkvm-console-types-group v0.7.5 (https://github.com/AleoHQ/snarkVM.git?rev=e866f2d#e866f2d2) ``` ```
